title: Assistant Professor (Tenure Track) in Business Law Lecturer in Business Law
location: 88 Daxue Rd, Ouhai, Zhejiang Province Wenzhou, China
job_description: Along with NYU Shanghai and Duke University Kunshan, Wenzhou-Kean University (WKU) is one of only three full legal-person Sino-American universities with all English instruction approved by the Ministry of Education in China. We invite applications for full-time positions at the rank of Assistant Professor (tenure track) or Lecturer in Business Law to begin in Spring or Fall 2022. Ability to demonstrate quality teaching is a must. The successful candidate will be able to teach business law and ethics courses, as well as participate in the full range of faculty responsibilities. JD or LLM degree from a top law school and seasoned industry or teaching experience are required; experience waiver is granted to those graduate in the top 10% of the class by July 2022. To receive full consideration by the search committee, candidates need to submit a cover letter, CV, research statement if you are applying for tenure track, unofficial transcripts and contact information for three references by email to: Search Committee Chairperson at wkucbpm@wku.edu.cn . Official transcripts for terminal degrees and three current letters of recommendation are required before appointment.  WKU sits on over 500 beautiful acres with new state-of-the-art facility (http://www.wku.edu.cn/en/cbpm/). A city of 9 million people, Wenzhou is only one hour by plane and just over three hours by high-speed train from Shanghai and Hong Kong. Business faculty positions at WKU offer: Highly competitive salaries that are multi-year Tax-Free for citizens of countries such as U.S.A.Generous home leave, housing, schooling, and relocation allowances, as well as 8% front-load retirement benefits with immediate vesting.Research fundingA collegial environmentThe opportunity to teach high quality students with half of them go to the graduate schools at Top 50 Universities in the world.Wenzhou-Kean University is an Equal Opportunity Employer
employer_description: Wenzhou-Kean University is a Chinese-American jointly established higher education institution with Independent legal person status and limited liabilities.
